001001 00000 00001 0101010101010101     # addi $r0 $r1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $f1 $r1
001001 00000 00010 0000000000000100     # addi $r2 4
110011 00001 00000 00010 00000 000000   # swoc1 $f1 $r0 $r2 # memory[1] = $f1

001001 00000 00001 0000111100001111     # addi $r0 $r1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $f1 $r1
001001 00000 00001 1111111111111110     # addi $r1 -2
001001 00000 00010 0000000000001010     # addi $r2 10
110011 00001 00000 00010 00000 000000   # swoc1 $f1 $r1 $r2 # memory[2] = $f1

001001 00000 00010 0000000000000110     # addi $r0 $r2 6
001001 00000 00011 1111111111111110     # addi $r0 $r3 -2
110001 00010 00011 00010 00000 000000   # lwoc1 $r2 $r3 $f2 # $f2 = memory[1]
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $f2
0000000000000000   0101010101010101

001001 00000 00010 0000000000000110     # addi $r0 $r2 6
001001 00000 00011 0000000000000010     # addi $r0 $r3 2
110001 00010 00011 00010 00000 000000   # lwoc1 $r2 $r3 $f2 # $f2 = memory[2]
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $f2
0000000000000000   0000111100001111

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
